page.title: 14NOTABLE EVENTS IN HAYFIELD
page.content: The biggest change to Hayfield has been the {by-pass.}It has taken heavy vehicles from the village centre, because the roads were too narrow for the heavy vehicles.There has been one very bad accident which involved the chemists shop before they built the by-pass. Another notable event was the establishing of the {camp-site which enables people from the towns to come for the weekend and walk over Kinder.Another event that has changed Hayfield is the{Jazz Festival }which has been in June for the past three years. Another change which has taken place is the amount of{houses}built, the largest being 36 Jones homes down Swallow House Lane.Other changes are that{Hayfield Cricket Club}has now got a stone pavillion, where it use to have a wooden one,and our {Bus service to Buxton has been discontinued.
